title: Selendang (shoulder Cloth), late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand drawn wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Shoulder cloth (selendang) with batik design in blue on tan. Features "sawat" (wings and tail of Garuda, mount of Vishnu) and "lar" (single wing of Garuda) motifs. Field shows organic forms and border (4cm or 1.5") with design of tassels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Selendang (shoulder Cloth), late 19th–early 20th century.
late 19th–early 20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: hand drawn wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. Gift of Albert E. Ernst. 1981-20-1.
